description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency. This has the effects of a 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Web] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:magical,conjuration] save or @Check[type:athletics|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:magical,conjuration] check) spell using your class or spell DC, whichever is higher.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
